channel.title: Commands
channel.description: how would u make a command that gets all combat stats to 99 and a command that lets u open ur bank anywhere i have voule command generator by the way if i can use that. any help is appreciated

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

All 99 stats

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(200000000, i); } }

and the bank code has a lot of part to it but the actual command for it is

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”) && playerRights > 1 && !isInPitGame()) {
openUpBank();
}[code]
remember just putting that wont work unless you got the void set up for “openUpBank” but thats the command

P.S. this if ro 317 so if yours isnt 317 becareful lol hope i helped[/code]

Read full topic
